title: Application of green solvents for arsenic removal from petroleum produced water: Statistical, DFT and McCabe-Thiele determination
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Natthawan Srinam, Vanee Mohdee, Ura Pancharoen, Kasidit Nootong, Kreangkrai Maneeintr, Wikorn Punyain, Sirikul Chunsawang
